attributes.action: promote Britishness by saving the job of Postmaster Deva Kumarasiri
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Postmaster Deva Kumarasiri has said what the silent magority have wanted to say but couldn't for fear of being called racist. SAVE HIS JOB

rejection.details: As this relates to an individual case rather than government policy, please contact the Post Office to raise your concerns.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
